def isEven(num):
    return num % 2 == 0

def getOdd(arr):
    return [num for num in arr if not isEven(num)]

def getEven(arr):
    return [num for num in arr if isEven(num)]

def getSum(arr):
    return sum(arr)


def get_min_sum(arr):
    # if the array is all odd or all even, return the sum
    if len(getOdd(arr)) == 0 or len(getEven(arr)) == 0:
        return getSum(arr)

    # if the array has both even and odd, return the minimum of the sum of the evens and the sum of the odds
    else:
        return min(getSum(getOdd(arr)), getSum(getEven(arr)))

# fast I/O
raw_input = sys.stdin.readline
n = int(raw_input())
arr = list(map(int, raw_input().split()))
print(get_min_sum(arr))
